title: HTL47D is it still out there?

posts.content:
I’m sure it is still out there but does anyone on here know who may own it?

I see it doesn’t have an mot but of course it may now be registered such that it doesn’t need one. It is a 1966 13 window deluxe originally in velvet green and pearl white but I’m sure I saw it restored as a wedding bus after my ownership about 12 years ago and it was all an ivory/white colour. It would be good to track it down if anyone has any ideas on where it may be.

Thanks

Steve

Its showing as taxed, must be hiding somewhere !

Sent from my SM-G973F using Tapatalk
